title: Frozen Turtle Shell
summaries: The Frozen Turtle Shell is a Hardmode accessory that has a (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 1/50 (2%) / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 1/100 (1%) chance of being dropped by the Ice Tortoise, an enemy found in the Ice biome. It grants the Ice Barrier buff when equipped, with the effects varying between versions:

• (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) Gives 25% damage reduction as long as their health remains at or below 50%.
  • (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) Gives the player 30 defense when below 25% health.
While not normally visible, it displays as a small blue circle spinning around the character that emits light when active.
